summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 27, Heirs of S. A. Bell's 2nd Addition, being the alley between 8th Avenue and 9th Avenue, north of Howell Street, as platted and deeded; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9796 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
